description: This file defines a singleton object AppViewModelFactory that provides factory methods to create various ViewModels associated with an Android application, specifically for Devices, SharedDevice, and Settings, using a common repository.

classes.name: Factory
classes.description: A private inner class implementing ViewModelProvider.Factory to instantiate specific ViewModel subclasses based on the class type.

methods.name: createDevicesViewModel
methods.description: Creates and returns a DevicesViewModel instance associated with the given context.

methods.name: createSharedDeviceViewModel
methods.description: Creates and returns a SharedDeviceViewModel instance associated with the given context.

methods.name: createSettingsViewModel
methods.description: Creates and returns a SettingsViewModel instance associated with the given context.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Factory method that creates ViewModel instances based on class type, using the provided AppRepository.
